snippet: The United States Coast Guard reported that samples from an oil sheen spotted in the Gulf of Mexico last month match the oil that gushed from the source of the BP oil spill of 2010.
abstract: United States Coast Guard reports that samples from an oil sheen spotted in Gulf of Mexico match the oil that gushed from well of 2010 oil spill.
lead_paragraph: The United States Coast Guard reported that samples from an oil sheen spotted in the Gulf of Mexico last month match the oil that gushed from the source of the BP oil spill of 2010.

headline.main: Louisiana: Oil Sheen Linked to 2010 BP Spill
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Oil Sheen Linked to 2010 BP Spill
